summary:
OGUK - BOSIET - CA EBS - VISA B1 OCS - PASSPORT - SEAMANS BOOK.

PLC - TIA Portal, SIMATIC STEP7 - Programming - STL, LADDER, FBD, SCL and GRAPH.

LAY SYSTEM - FLEXIBLE AND RIGID ( HUISMAN, IHC, IMECA )

AUTOMATION - Projects and development of integrated systems (communication, supervision and control). Industrial Ethernet, Profinet, Profibus, Devicenet, ASI, CanOpen, Optical Fiber, ModBus (RS232/422/485). Supervisors - (HMI, SDCD, SCADA) Elipse, CitectSCADA, RSview and WinCC. (SIEMENS, ALLEN-BRADLEY ROCKWELL, UNITRONICS, BECKHOFF, SCHNEIDER, WAGO, ABB).
 
ELECTRICAL - Maintenance (preventive and corrective) electrical installation of low and high voltage, generator set, bank capacitors, transformers, substations, electric motors, frequency inverters, softstarter, PLCs, HMIs, QTA, USCA, QGBT, relays, nobreaks, lighting and outlets. Projects in AutoCad 2D and 3D, Solidworks, MSproject. Command / Motors (DANFOSS, SCHNEIDER, WEG, SEW, ABB, WOELFER). BT / MT, Circuit Breakers (SIEMENS, ABB, GE, BEGHIM, SCHNEIDER). 

INSTRUMENTATION - proportional and control valves (0 - 10V) (4 - 20mA) (HART), digital controllers, transducers pressure, temperature and flow, position sensors, speed, presence, load, pressure, level, flow and temperature. (SMAR, YOKOGAWA, CONAUT - KROHNE, NOVUS, FESTO, IFM, GEFRAN, SENSE, KELLER, TURK, HYDAC, BOSCH REXROTH). 

GENERATORS - Installation, corrective and preventive maintenance, startup, retrofit, commissioning, dimensioning. Control and remote monitoring. Commands (COMAP, DEIF, WOODWARD, DEEP SEA, KVA). Engines (SCANIA, MTU, CUMMINS, CATERPILLAR). Generators (WEG, CRAMACO, STAMFORD). 

ELECTRONICS - Maintenance (Digital and analog). Testing on boards and components, controllers, meters, converters, transducers and control modules. 

MECHANICAL - Pneumatics, Hydraulics, Elements. 

ALPINISM - Installation, maintenance, inspection, assembly and electrical repairs of low and high voltage.

profile_positions.description:
AMAZON VESSEL

Tower - Travelling clamp and assembly, HOC and assembly, A&R System, Loader Arm, Deck Workstation, HPU, PLET Handling System, Adjusters.

Coating station - trolleys, Blasting/Sabre, Magnetic heater FBE/Raptor, Chanfer preparation/PCP, Radiant heater/Solaris and IMPP. 

Preparation - Supply line system, Selmers robots, Beveling Machines, Pigging, Degaussing, Pre-Heating.

Production - OPG, ILUC, LUT, Weld and coating Workstations, Conveyor system, pinnacle elevators.

Historian, Smart FIT/OMS - optical metrology service, AUT - Automated ultrasonic testing, pipe tracking.

Electric and hydraulic motors, drives, brakes, gearbox, winch, balance beams.

Equipment - Remacut, IHC, Selmers, PIH, Huisman, Vermaat.

Cranes - Huisman 400mT, TTS 30mT.

HVAC - FCU-SCU pumps, Chillers, Fan coils.

Softwares - TIA Portal, WinCC, Simatic STEP7, Citect SCADA, PowerWave Lincon, NCDrive Vacon, DriveComposer ABB, WinMRC MRU.
profile_positions.title: E&M Pipe Lay Electrical Technician

profile_positions.description:
Skandi Açu - Skandi Búzios - Skandi Niterói

Operation and maintenance TLS - Tiltable Lay System: Service crane, Aligner, EHS End Handling System, A & R deployment sheave box, Centralisers, Tensioners, Deflector, SETS Second End Transfer System, Hoisting beams, Moonpool, Ajusters, Baskets. HPU Hydraulic Power Unit, EPU Eletric Power Unit, Winch: Initiation, Traction, Storage, Deck service. 

OFFSHORE - Electro-hydraulic, pneumatic and electric actuators. Pressure and flow transducers, position sensors, speed (encoder incremental / absolute), presence, load, pressure, level, flow and temperature. Processing Units, Remote I / O - Profinet, CLP SIEMENS - Simatic Manager / STEP7, SCHNEIDER - UnityPro, IHM - SCADA. Electric motors (440 / 690v), brakes magnetic, ABB drives, protection, control and force devices.
profile_positions.title: ELECTRICAL TECHNICIAN

profile_positions.description:
Calibration and Predictive, Preventive and Corrective Maintenance of the equipment of the production process and utilities. 

FreeForm - Machines: (Schneider / CMSatisloh / H3 / Syrus) - Fasteners, blockers, generators, polishers, markerlaser and coating. CNC and Robotics - Servo motors, driver, encoders, inverters, CLP, IHM, NC industrial PC, I / O, sensors and actuators tires.
profile_positions.title: ELECTROMECHANICAL TECHNICIAN

profile_positions.description:
SUBSEA - TC (Tree cap), ANM (wet Christmas tree), BAP (production adapter base) - MCV (production, umbilical), SCPS (wellhead). System Control - MCS (master control subsea), EPU (electronic power unit), HPU (hydraulic power unit ) SCM (subsea control module), SEM (subsea control module), SDU (subsea distribution unit), IMUX PDG sensors), electrical and hydraulic jumpers. 

Subsea instruments - Control and status - Pressure, temperature, PIG detector, meter flow and multiphase. (4-20mA, ModBus, CanBus). 

Industrial - Bridge cranes, gantry, machinery and equipment production and testing, maintenance and installation power. Machining / Machining / CNC milling machine, CNC lathe, CNC vertical lathe, tig welding (Mazak, wotan, Romi, Toyoda, Fronius). Controls / Heidenhain, Mazatrol, Fanuc and Siemens (ITNC 530, TNC 415B / 425, MAZATROL M32 / T PLUS, FANUC, SINUMERIK). 

Fault diagnosis – Alarm number HMI, adjustments in parameters, reading diagrams and electrical drawings, logic of programming in ladder (advanced) and / or STL (basic), test circuits: Electrical - (Protection devices - Force and control, (Spindle and X, Y, Z, W and B), 

Electronic (Encoders - (rotary and linear / incremental and absolute), CLP / NC - (digital and analog I / O - sensors / position, pressure, level and temperature) Serial ports RS232 /422/485, Pneumatic - (Compressors, conditioning unit, directional control valves, locking, pressure, Hydraulic - (Reservoirs, pumps, filters, valves (safety, directional and pressure regulators, actuators). Refrigeration and lubrication systems. Calibration of axes with balbar system application and / or dial indicator.
profile_positions.title: SUBSEA TECHNICIAN

profile_positions.description:
SS 50 DRILLER TRANSOCEAN

Installation and electrical maintenance drilling rig SS 50 Driller Transocean. Adequacy of facilities according to NR10 - Classified areas. (Ex equipment - luminaires, conduits, panels, motors, sockets and plugs).
profile_positions.title: OFFSHORE ELECTRICAL TECHNICIAN - IRATA

profile_positions.description:
Process - Dusting (malt storage silos, conveyors, elevators, mills, bag filters, cleaners, breakers, load cells). Maintenance and conservation.
Manufacturing (mash tanks, filtration, wort boiler and whirlpool-decanter). Electromechanical maintenance - motors, drives, pumps, valves (I / P), pneumatic manifolds, electrical panels, remote I / Os, QGBT, thermographs, hydraulic units.
Cellar (maturation, fermentation and pressure tanks, mobile yeast transfer pump).
Filtration (centrifuges, carbonators, blenders, deaerators, candle filters).
Utilities - Compressed air plant (compressors, filters, dryers, tanks (lung).
Utilities - Boiler (Burners, fans, pumps, gas and / or oil system).
Utilities - CO2 plant (capture tank, foam and water separators, washing tower, compressors, filters, dehydrators, distillation column, NH3 compressor, liquid separators, condensers, reservoirs and reflux tank).
Utilities - Refrigeration unit - Ammonia (compresses, heat exchangers, condensers, liquid separator, reservoir and pumps, cold water and ethanol).
ETA - Water treatment station (collection of surface and well water, reservoirs, treatment, decantation and filtration).
ETDI - Industrial waste treatment station (elevators, rotating screens, equalization and conditioning tank, reactors, gasometer, polishing pond and aeration).
Common areas (external lighting, cold water system, hot water system, general and specific use plugs, building electrical installations, refrigeration-cold chamber system, bagasse disposal silos).
Filling - filler, pasteurizer, labeler, palletizer, depalletizer, bottle washers.
profile_positions.title: Senior Electrical Technician

profile_positions.description: Industrial electronics - industrial automation of machines in industrial production process and components. (Applied physics, basic electricity, fundamentals of electrotechnics, technical design, basic electronics, industrial electronics, digital electronics, building electrical installations, industrial electrical installations, electrical machines, system power, electrical projects, industrial automation, industrial instrumentation, building automation, AutoCad, NR 10).
profile_positions.title: Electrical instructor / teacher - RPA

profile_positions.description:
Maintenance - Automation (integrated monitoring and control system).
Electrical (substation, control and power panels, installation and maintenance).
Hydraulics (cold water, sewage, rainwater, fire and gas pipes).
Civil (painting, waterproofing, repairs to floors, walls, ceilings and facades).
Refrigeration (CAG, chillers, fancoils, split, exhaust fans, fans and drinking fountains).
Seralheria (assembly and repair of small metallic structures).
ETE - effluent treatment station (maintenance, cleaning and conservation).
General services (cleaning, maintenance, transport and support).
profile_positions.title: MAINTENANCE SUPERVISOR
